verses.roman:
bhāgavatera śloka-gūḍhārtha viśada kariñā
rūpa-gosāñi śloka kaila loka bujhāiñā

synonyms: bhāgavatera—of Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam; śloka—the verse; gūḍha-artha—confidential meaning; viśada—elaborate description; kariñā—doing; rūpa-gosāñi—Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; śloka—the verse; kaila—compiled; loka—the people in general; bujhāiñā—making understand.
translation: In one verse, Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī has explained the confidential meaning of the verse of Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam for the understanding of the general populace.
